description: Enterprise techniques used by Zox, ATT&CK software S0672 (v1.1)
name: Zox (S0672)

techniques.comment: [Zox](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0672) has the ability to upload files from a targeted system.(Citation: Novetta-Axiom)
[Zox](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0672) has used the .PNG file format for C2 communications.(Citation: Novetta-Axiom)
[Zox](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0672) has the ability to leverage local and remote exploits to escalate privileges.(Citation: Novetta-Axiom)
[Zox](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0672) can enumerate files on a compromised host.(Citation: Novetta-Axiom)
[Zox](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0672) can download files to a compromised machine.(Citation: Novetta-Axiom)
[Zox](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0672) has been encoded with Base64.(Citation: Novetta-Axiom)
[Zox](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0672) has the ability to list processes.(Citation: Novetta-Axiom)
[Zox](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0672) has the ability to use SMB for communication.(Citation: Novetta-Axiom)
